article_title: SL Green Near Deal To Buy 11 Madison Ave. In New York
article_text:
Landlord SL Green Realty Corp. is near a deal to buy the office tower at 11 Madison Ave. in New York for about $2.6 billion in what would be the second highest price ever paid for a U.S. office building, according to people briefed on the talks.

The gray Art Deco building, home to the U.S. headquarters of Sony Corp. and Credit Suisse AG, would give New York-based SL Green a giant 2.3 million square foot property just northeast of the...
